sentences: Chair Machado noted that a number of contact groups had met to discuss the assembly document, which deals with a shared vision, mitigation, adaptation, and delivering on technology and financing.
He indicated that there had been 164 submissions in total for the assembly text, amounting to more than 1000 pages of input.
He said this demonstrates the active interest and engagement of parties, and that this updated text will provide a strong basis for work in 2009 (FCCC/AWGLCA/2008/16/Rev.1).
